trigger_description: This trigger fires every time your oven door has been closed.
This triggers fires every time the child lock has been deactivated.
This trigger fires every time the clock timer on your oven has elapsed.
This trigger fires every time your oven is turned on.
This trigger fires every time your oven is turned off.
This trigger fires every time your oven has finished successfully.
This trigger fires every time the preheating phase has finished. Please note that you have to start the heating program with enabled fast preheat.
This trigger fires every time your oven has started.
This trigger fires every time your oven door has been opened.
